location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As Glenn Lawhon , a rural Florida minister who is the victim 's father , looked on , Mills was pronounced dead at 7:13 a.m. EST ( 1213 GMT ) for the murder of Lester Lawhon .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| rural Florida |
| EST (1213 GMT) |

In this paragraph, the locations mentioned are "rural Florida" and "EST (1213 GMT)". EST stands for Eastern Standard Time, which is a time zone. Therefore, it is included as a location in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| rural Florida |
| EST |

In this paragraph, the locations mentioned are "rural Florida" and "EST". "EST" stands for Eastern Standard Time, which is a time zone. Therefore, it is included as a location in this context. "GMT" is a time standard, not a location, and "Lester Lawhon" and "Glenn Lawhon" are people, not locations.
